title: Bloomberg Markets: Zeller on Changes in Angel Investing
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Zeller on Changes in Angel Investing
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Jake Zeller Partner AngelList Discussing how syndicated Angel investing is changing and his Angel Fund that helps start and manage venture capital funds. Bloomberg Contributor Woody Benson also participates in the discussion.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
